text: The 2015 European Fencing Championships were held in Montreux, Switzerland from 5 to 11 June 2015 at the Montreux Music & Convention Centre. ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable" style="margin:0.5em auto; font-size:90%;" |- |bgcolor=#00cc33| ● ||Opening Ceremony|| bgcolor=#ffcc00| ● ||Finals||bgcolor=#ee3333| ● ||Closing Ceremony |- |} {| class="wikitable" style="margin:0.5em auto; font-size:90%; line-height:1.25em;" |- ! colspan="2" | June !! 5 !! 6 !! 7 !! 8 !! 9 !! 10 !! 11 !!
